scripts.dev: npm run dev:backend & npm run dev:frontend & npm run dev:electron
scripts.dev:electron: wait-on http://localhost:4000 && wait-on http://localhost:5173 && cd electron && npm start
scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend && npm run build:electron
scripts.package:win: npm run build && cd electron && npm run package:win
scripts.package:mac: npm run build && cd electron && npm run package:mac
scripts.package:linux: npm run build && cd electron && npm run package:linux
scripts.clean:all: npm run clean && rimraf node_modules package-lock.json
scripts.postinstall: npm install --prefix frontend && npm install --prefix backend && npm install --prefix electron
